headline: Retirement plan sponsors slow-walk private asset adoption, new report finds
summary: According to a new report from consulting firm Cerulli Associates, a small number of employer-provided retirement plans are rolling out offerings with private asset options this year. But it will be roughly a decade before even 20% do so.
